column1: tobystephensinv "Finished shooting In Vitro last night. One of the best experiences I've ever had. Very lucky to have such a great team. Let's do it again! T" "Wed Nov 12 09:05:41 +0000 2014" True
tobystephensinv "We've Turned over on IN VITRO. A top first day. A huge thank you to everyone who's helped get us here. I'll post pictures soon." "Sat Nov 08 17:56:51 +0000 2014" True
tobystephensinv "Start shooting on Saturday. Four day schedule. Amazing cast. Amazing crew. Great locations. I'll post pictures. T" "Tue Nov 04 20:42:56 +0000 2014" True
tobystephensinv "Amazing support for IN VITRO. Incredible total on Indiegogo. Invaluable help from Ralph Fiennes
column2: the Broccoli family and Alan Rickman." "Mon Oct 27 18:16:27 +0000 2014" True

column1: tobystephensinv "Last 24 hrs on the In Vitro Indiegogo site for those who'd like to support my film. A big thank you to those who already have. T" "Sun Oct 26 09:03:23 +0000 2014" True
tobystephensinv "Over seventeen thousand raised on Indiegogo. Almost there with the budget. Starting prep on film tomorrow. It's happening. A big thanks. T" "Wed Oct 22 19:19:52 +0000 2014" True
tobystephensinv "@Rockchickbabe thank you! It does. A lot. Back at ya. T" "Sun Oct 19 14:46:42 +0000 2014" True
tobystephensinv "Almost at fifteen thousand pounds. Incredible! I'm so grateful to everyone who's so generously helped me. Thank you. T" "Sat Oct 18 21:16:09 +0000 2014" True
tobystephensinv "I have over half my budget now - which is fantastic!!! If I can get my Indiegogo total to fifteen thousand we'll be in business!! Thanks!!!T" "Tue Oct 14 11:34:40 +0000 2014" True
tobystephensinv "Arrive back in London to a leaden dawn. Rain. Traffic. Love it! T" "Mon Oct 13 06:04:17 +0000 2014" True
tobystephensinv "@youngmeganne_ Ignore Arnold. I love getting your twitterings.  Look forward to seeing you soon in CT. Tx" "Sun Oct 12 18:51:22 +0000 2014" True
tobystephensinv "Just want to say a big thank you to all the fans of Black Sails who came to Comicon NY. Great to meet you. You're gonna love season 2! T" "Sun Oct 12 16:59:52 +0000 2014" True
tobystephensinv "close to ¬£10
column2: 000 raised. That is amazing!!! Thank you for your generosity. Great to be in NY with my shipmates. Beautiful autumn weather." "Fri Oct 10 09:46:54 +0000 2014" True
